Reviews: Disgusting. Ordered on Uber eats and it was awful quality of food . The chicken was PINK still. You can also tell they use nasty oil (and probably don't clean the oil) to fry everything in. I didn't even finish eating it even though I was starving. I am not a picky eater either. DO NOT EAT HERE
Replies: Bullet points: - Poor quality of food - Chicken was pink still.

Reviews: Disgusting!!! Do not eat here. Ordered on doordash. Not even one star. Chicken was pink still and not crispy or spicy at all. Disgusting. Also fries are like 5 dollars extra and they only serve you a few fries. Not worth spending your money or risking your health!!
Replies: Bullet points: - Chicken was undercooked and pink in color. - The chicken was not crispy or spicy.

Reviews: Food was ordered through door dash and just the worst! Fried chicken sandwich was cold, the chicken was smashed way too thin and had too much breading. Truly, so awful.
Replies: Bullet points: - Fried chicken sandwich was served cold. - Chicken was smashed too thin. - Sandwich had too much breading.

Reviews: This place is up on door dash, I don't even know if it's the same place but, if it is, it's fake. Just ordered the vegan burger, and when I took a bite, it tasted like real meat. Lo and behold, it was real f-cking meat. Absolutely disgusting, and extremely disrespectful.  I ordered the vegan burger, i have a diet restriction due to my health, so ive been vegan to accommodate my health. I can't eat real meat, I can't eat dairy, and these wise guys here either don't care, are discriminatory towards vegans, or are just stupid stupid and stupid.  We can sue you for this. Don't be surprised if you get sued.
Replies: Bullet points: - User ordered a vegan burger - Burger tasted like real meat - It was discovered that the burger contained real meat - User found this disgusting and disrespectful

Reviews: The food is over-cooked, cold, chewy, unedible.
Replies: Bullet points: - Food quality is poor - Over-cooked, cold, and chewy food - Food is not edible.

Reviews: Nasty...nasty...nasty.  Cold no taste at all.  Onion rings are fried onions not breaded.  The worst food I have had delivered during the pandemic.  I have Lupus I am limited on going out to eat, but you hope trying a new restaurant would be a good experience.  This is not the place.
Replies: Bullet points: - Poor food quality. - Food was cold and lacked taste. - Onion rings were not breaded, but rather fried onions.

Summary: Based on the bullet points provided, it seems that there are some major concerns with the food quality at Beverly Hills Burger Bungalow. The most common negative feedback was that the chicken was undercooked or pink in color. This was mentioned in multiple bullet points and seems to be a consistent issue. Additionally, some customers reported that the chicken was not crispy or spicy, and the fried chicken sandwich was served cold. Another area of concern was the breading on the chicken sandwich, with some customers feeling that there was too much of it. Some also reported that the chicken was smashed too thin, leading to a less satisfying texture. There was also one instance of a customer ordering a vegan burger, but finding out that it contained real meat. This was a major problem for the customer, who felt disrespected by the mistake. Overall, the food quality was consistently reported as poor, with issues such as overcooked, cold, and chewy food. Onion rings were also mentioned as not meeting customer expectations, with some reporting that they were not breaded properly.
